attributes.action: Top up Private sector workers pensions in the same way same way Public sectors are
attributes.additional_details:
As the Govenrment has unsuccesfully re-levelled the Public sectors Pensions in Line with Private sectors , Maybe the government should now supplement the private sectors pensions to be in line with those of Public Sector.
Bear in mind that private sectorworkers are fundamental in paying the taxes which fund the governments top up of public sectors high salaries and fantastic Pensions .
